pr_title: DPC-162 add auth related logging filter

timeline.bodyText: Could we make this client_assertion (singular) since that's likely the name for the parameter? Or maybe include both to show that client_assertion anywhere is rejected.
timeline.author: em1

replies.bodyText: ah good catch, I even copied it from the token resource so I have no idea how an s got appended lol
replies.author: MrBilnon
